traits.Unarmored Defense: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
traits.Unarmored Movement: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).

actions.Multiattack: The hurricane makes two melee attacks.
actions.Unarmed Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
